long_description: The short-tail Headsweats Shorty Gear helmet liner is a no-brainer to put on, yet it still manages moisture and protects from the sun's rays. CoolMax(R) polyester fabric wicks moisture and moves it to outer layers for quick drying; CoolMax terry headband absorbs moisture and prevents sweat from hitting your eyes. Elastic band keeps hat in place without any adjustments. Excellent under any helmet. With a SPF 20 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The short-tail Headsweats Shorty Gear helmet liner is a no-brainer to put on, yet it still manages moisture and protects from the sun's rays.
